name: The Crypt of Treasure
description:
Play as a Miner after he discovered a secret crypt full of treasure and unnerving foes!

Soon after you'll discover, that the crypt is mysteriously haunted! The doors keep disappearing behind you and you keep coming across branching paths! Will you get lost? Or will you gather all the treasure and come out a victor?

The Crypt of Treasure is a dark, atmospheric power rush rouge-like where you have to survive hordes of deadly enemies and make decisions that affect your chances of survival!

Credits:

Art - flouter, gooun, quubs

Music - flouter

SFX - gooun, flouter

Spaghetti Code -  quubs, gooun, flouter

AI - gooun

Game Design - quubs, gooun, flouter

This game was made by me and my friends for fun. All art assets, music and sound effects were made from scratch, specifically for this game jam (except for a few CC0 sfx from freesound.org :p)

Stay tuned for updates with more content and gameplay improvements! :D
